verses.verse: Therefore we <S%H3372>won't<s%> be afraid, though the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4171>changes,<s%> though the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are <S%H4131>shaken<s%> into the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%>
though its <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1993>roar<s%> and are <S%H2560>troubled,<s%> though the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7493>tremble<s%> with their <S%H1346>swelling.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

There is a <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H6388>streams<s%> of which make the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8055>glad,<s%> the <S%H6918>holy<s%> place of the <S%H4908>tents<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> is in her <S%H7130>midst.<s%> She shall not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> her <S%H6437>at<s%> <S%H1242>dawn.<s%>
The <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1993>raged.<s%> The <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> were <S%H4131>moved.<s%> He <S%H5414>lifted<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4127>melted.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is with <S%H430>us.<s%> The God of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is our <S%H4869>refuge.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

He makes <S%H4421>wars<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> He <S%H7665>breaks<s%> the <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H7112>shatters<s%> the <S%H2595>spear.<s%> <S%H7112><s%> He <S%H8313>burns<s%> the <S%H5699>chariots<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
"Be <S%H7503>still,<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H430>God.<s%> I will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> I will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is with <S%H430>us.<s%> The God of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is our <S%H4869>refuge.<s%> Selah.
